?run_on_npu: whether run on NPU, or it will run on CPU
?min_compute_queue_length: the internal queue used for voting for the most candidate result in one specific length
?min_scale_factor: with min_compute_queue_length, only when the target occupation excceeds this thresh will be voted out
?clear_global_queue_reaching_empty_det_l: clear the above queue when reaching continuous empty detections to avoid shaky result
?treat_half_close_as_close: true : half_close handled as close ; false : half_close handled as open
